bug.author: waltsims
bug.summary: polyaxon config check fails erroneously when helm not installed
bug.description:
OS: Distributor ID: Ubuntu Description: Ubuntu 19.04 Release: 19.04 Codename: disco Version polyaxon-cli 0.5.6 Issue polyaxon does not check config if helm is not installed: polyaxon returns: <denchmark-code>kubernetes installed config invalid helm not installed </denchmark-code>
even though the config was correct.
